        Checks if a given user exists. If they do, simply returns false. If not, it'll create user data for that user, then return true.

        Throws:

      • readUser

        @Deprecated
public static LegacyFlamesUser readUser​(java.lang.String id,
                                        boolean skipConsent)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        ConsentException
        Deprecated.
        Reads data for a user from the data directory
        Parameters:
        skipConsent - If true, won't throw an exception if the user hasn't consented. For most cases, leave this false or null.
        Returns:
        A LegacyFlamesUser created from the data file
        Throws:
        ConsentException - If the user hasn't consented yet won't return data, unless you ask nicely
        java.io.IOException
